DOC.detailed_description: This Single-centered , Prospective , Observational Study . The study design include two phase . In Phase I , investigator enrol set consecutive patient non-ischemic cardiomyopathy perform contrast-enhanced cardiac magnetic resonance baseline severe cardiac dysfunction ( defined cardiac magnetic resonance LVEF equal less 35 % ) FuWai Hospital 2010 2013 . The investigator collect patient ' clinical baseline data cardiac magnetic resonance specific data ( Late gadolinium enhancement mass ) . All patient follow every six month phone clinical visit . The primary endpoint composite sudden cardiac death ( SCD ) , ventricular arrhythmia ( VAs ) SCD/VAs relate Implantable Cardioverter defibrillator cardiac resynchronization therapy-cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD/CRTD ) shock . The investigator plan establish quantitative LGE mass base model ( include LGE mass cardiac magnetic resonance , clinical feature , specific medical history , et al ) risk prediction sudden cardiac death analyse phase I data ( 1-year model 3-year model ) . In Phase II , investigator enroll another group non-ischemic cardiomyopathy ( NICM ) patient 2014 2015 testify risk prediction model ( 1-year model ) investigator construct phase I . The investigator aim find real high risk NICM patient may suffer SCD VAs severe cardiac dysfunction .
